but i have error message
What's the message Pawelk? Also, you can upload your craft to Mediafire, pastebin or dropbox and post the link
You have to put the file in a .zip first before you can upload it.

You have to put the file in a .zip first before you can upload it.

I uploaded my craft
It would great if you could explain a little about it so that people can help you easily

It would great if you could explain a little about it so that people can help you easily

I have problem with SRB exploding during separation, my earlier design doesn't required SRB, but when i tried to create lander that,s make rocked bit to heavy

With design called Saturn3B i make orbit around mun and back to Kerbin but the new one can't even leave the atmosphere
SRB's should be safe as long at they have burnt out before you separate, and as long as they don't impact other parts when they are jettisoned.

I would be grateful for advice on how to increase the lifting capacity of my racket, when it was composed of only capsule MK2 everything was fine, but I wanted to do a munar lander, all goes wrong.

And I just wanted to my astronauts, they made one small for Kerbal but one giant leap for kerbal kind

As with most things in KSP, moar boosters is the way to go

So add some more engines and fuel, plus some struts to hold it together, and see what happens
